contents.item: Believe in God is the beauty of being.
It is amazing how complete is the delusion that beauty is goodness.
If she could no longer be called beautiful, she possessed something better-a knowledge of beauty; it’s inflated value, it’s inevitable loss.
contents.owner: Hilary Thayer Hamann, Anthropology of an American Girl

contents.item: Health, peace of mind, peak performance, and success in any area of life all depend upon doing the right thing at the right time, in harmony with the cycles of the Four Seasons.
contents.owner: Tobe Hanson, The Four Seasons Way of Life:: Ancient Wisdom for Healing and Personal Growth

contents.item: I am that I ama Goddess, a Godentitled to the deepest and most beautiful sensationsoffered by Heaven and EarthIn love I trustIn Wisdom I am revealed
We don't really change. We finally begin to live a life that is true to our values.
Beauty exists not in what is seen and remembered, but in what is felt and never forgotten.
Never mourn the loss of innocence, because it always brings the much greater gain of wisdom.
In darkness, some flowers blossom!
Beware trying to iron out all your quirks, perceived flaws and doubts. It's often these things that help you find strength, compassion, empathy for others and heart.
Just like a flower, you are a creation of unique beauty from the one essence of life.
I think happiness is what makes you pretty. Period. Happy people are beautiful. They become like a mirror and they reflect that happiness.
A thing of beauty is a joy forever.
contents.owner: John Keats, Endymion: A Poetic Romance

contents.item: There are as many styles of beauty as there are visions of happiness.
There is no beauty in sadness. No honor in suffering. No growth in fear. No relief in hate. It’s just a waste of perfectly good happiness.
A flower blossoms for its own joy.
I don't want to be the one who says life is beautiful. I want to be the one who feels it.

I promise you that the same stuff galaxies are made of, you are. The same energy that swings planets around stars makes electrons dance in your heart. It is in you, outside you, you are it. It is beautiful. Trust in this. And you your life will be grand.
You are beautiful. Your beauty, just like your capacity for life, happiness, and success, is immeasurable.
contents.owner: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

contents.item: Life isn't all grand, but it isn't all miserable either.  There's both sweet and sour in every day.  So why focus on the ugly when you can gaze at what's beautiful?  Concentrate on the good.
